titleStmt.title: The magistrates authority in matters of religion asserted. Or The right of the state in the Church. A discourse written in latine by Hugo Grotius: Englished by C.B. M.A.
titleStmt.author: Grotius, Hugo, 1583-1645.
Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joshua Kirton at the Kings Armes in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Translator's dedication signed: Barksdale [i.e. Clement Barksdale].
The first leaf bears verses, "Upon the author, and his principall works", signed: C.B.
Running title reads: Authority about sacred things belongs to the highest power.
With final contents leaves and advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.

place.placeName: the Kings Armes in St. Paul's Church-yard
